message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's worth a lot to you, and I'm willing to start with a competitive price of $120. What do you think?
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $90. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $110. What do you think?
I appreciate the willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit higher than $110. How about we try $95? I'm really interested in the product, but I have to make sure it fits within my budget.

I'm glad you're interested in the product, Bob! However, I'm not quite willing to go up to $95. I'm willing to compromise a bit more, so I'm counteroffering at $105. Let's see if we can meet in the middle again.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit higher than $105. How about we try $98? I'm really interested in the product, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.

I'm starting to think we're getting close, Bob! However, I'm not willing to go up to $98 just yet. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'm counteroffering at $102. Let's see if we can finally agree on a price.
I appreciate your persistence, Alice, but I'm still a bit higher than $102. How about we try $97? I'm really close to my budget, and I'd love to make a deal.

I'm glad you're close to your budget, Bob! However, I'm not willing to go up to $97 just yet. I'm willing to make one last compromise, so I'm counteroffering at $100. Let's see if we can finally seal the deal.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm really close to my budget. I'm willing to go up to $99, but no lower. That's the best I can do. Please let me know if you can meet me there.
